title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 101.4 - Computation of Assessment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 101.4 - Computation of Assessment

State Regulations

The total annual assessment for an institution shall be the
sum of its Supervisory Component and its Regulatory

Component. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23
ยง
101.4

Adopted

New

York State Register February 12, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 06, eff. 2/12/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
